editions.effect:
Put CARDNAME on the bottom of your champion's lineage. Then your champion's attacks this turn gain **true sight**, "This attack can't be redirected by **intercept"**, and "Choose the targets for this attack as though units didn't have **taunt**."

**Inherited Effect:** This object %has%gets% -2 [LIFE].
